Introduction
This topic contains examples of evaluating painful motion under 38 CFR 4.59, including
painful motion of the shoulder
non-objective pain under 38 CFR 4.59
pain with passive ROM under 38 CFR 4.59
, and
painful motion
of minor joints
, and
associated with flatfoot
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Painful Motion and Functional Loss
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
